about_the_game:
Fellowship is a survival action-roguelike game where you assemble a party of 5 heroes to combat hordes of monsters. Utilize unique skills, formations, and synergies to liberate the world of Eldrida from the shadow cast by Goltar, the dark sorcerer.

Forge an Unstoppable Party

Construct a team of five distinct heroes, each boasting unique skills, personalities, and combat styles. As you progress, discover and free new heroes, experimenting with varied party combinations in each run, ensuring no two adventures are alike.

Conquer Through Formations

Adapt and select the optimal formation in real-time. Unlock special party buffs to bolster your heroes against enemy hoards. Alternate between offensive and defensive stances, recognizing that each formation offers its own advantages. Use the right formation at the right time.

Discover Ultimate Party Synergies

Enhance your heroes' abilities and unearth potent skill synergies. Depending on your party's composition, activate powerful combo skills that can devastate your foes.

Loot, Customize, Conquer

Scour your surroundings! Gather resources, magical stones, and other valuable items to fortify your heroes. Upgrade your gear, grow stronger, and craft a legendary party ready to challenge the monstrous hordes.


Are you prepared to guide your party and rescue Eldrida from the encroaching darkness?

Early Access Content

  • 8 out of 12 distinct heroes to play with
  • Various synergies to bolster your party
  • Different combo skills to unlock and deploy against enemy hordes
  • 3 formations to optimize your party's combat prowess
  • 4 out of 10 diverse regions awaiting exploration and conquest
  • Accumulate a variety of resources for crafting and hero enhancement
  • Battle against +100 unique mobs
  • Challenge formidable bosses and mini-bosses, each with their own distinct mechanics and attack patterns
  • Delve into a world of vibrant, hand-drawn heroes, adversaries, and biomes

content_descriptors.notes: The game involve killing enemies as a core gameplay mechanic. Occasionally, 2D bones may appear upon an enemy's death to signify their defeat.
